statements: SELECT * FROM policy_info;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type FROM policy_info WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM policy_info WHERE policy_type = 'Health Insurance';
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, policy_start_date FROM policy_info ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(policy_id) AS policy_count FROM policy_info GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(policy_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM policy_info WHERE policy_type = 'Car Insurance';
SELECT policy_id, customer_id, policy_type FROM policy_info WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM policy_info WHERE policy_type LIKE '%Health%';
SELECT * FROM policy_info ORDER BY customer_id, policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, customer_id, policy_type, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM policy_info WHERE policy_start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM policy_information;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_status FROM policy_information WHERE policy_status = 'Active';
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_number, policy_status FROM policy_information ORDER BY policy_holder_name ASC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_number FROM policy_information WHERE policy_number LIKE 'PL%';
SELECT claim_id, claim_status, claim_amount FROM claims_status WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_information WHERE policy_status = 'active';
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_number FROM policy_information WHERE policy_holder_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY policy_number DESC;

SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, claim_amount FROM policy_information INNER JOIN claims_status ON policy_information.policy_id = claims_status.policy_id WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;

SELECT claim_id, policy_holder_name, claim_date FROM policy_information INNER JOIN claims_status ON policy_information.policy_id = claims_status.policy_id WHERE claim_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY claim_date ASC;

SELECT policy_holder_name, COUNT(claim_id) AS total_claims FROM policy_information LEFT JOIN claims_status ON policy_information.policy_id = claims_status.policy_id GROUP BY policy_holder_name HAVING total_claims >= 2 ORDER BY total_claims DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_info;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_info ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_number, policy_type FROM policy_information WHERE policy_type = 'Car';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_status FROM claims_status ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_information JOIN customer_info ON policy_information.customer_id = customer_info.customer_id;
SELECT policy_type, COUNT(*) FROM policy_information GROUP BY policy_type;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM claims_status WHERE claim_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT policy_number, claim_amount FROM policy_information JOIN claims_status ON policy_information.policy_id = claims_status.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM policy_information;
SELECT customer_name, policy_start_date FROM policy_information WHERE policy_end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT policy_number, customer_name FROM policy_information ORDER BY policy_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM claims_status WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_accounts WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT * FROM policy_information WHERE policy_number = 12345;
SELECT customer_name, policy_start_date FROM policy_information ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT policy_number, COUNT(*) AS total_claims FROM claims_status GROUP BY policy_number;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customer_accounts WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT p.policy_number, c.claim_status FROM policy_history p JOIN claims_status c ON p.claim_id = c.claim_id;
SELECT * FROM PolicyInformation ORDER BY policy_number DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, start_date FROM PolicyInformation WHERE policy_type = 'Life Insurance';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT agent_name, phone_number FROM Agents WHERE agent_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, policy_coverage FROM Policies WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(policy_coverage) > 200;
SELECT * FROM PolicyInformation;
SELECT policy_number, policy_type, start_date FROM PolicyInformation WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT policy_id, policy_number, start_date, end_date FROM PolicyInformation WHERE policy_type = 'Car Insurance';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM ClaimsStatus WHERE claim_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
